easy.q: I have a face and two hands but no arms or legs. I tell you the time with just a glance. What am I?
easy.hint: It hangs on the wall or sits on a desk.

medium.q: I rhyme with ‘start’ and can mean a sharp edge or a clever trick. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think of a word that can describe both a sharp edge and a clever idea.

hard.q: You see me once in a minute, twice in a moment, but never in a thousand years. What am I?
hard.hint: Consider letters in the phrases they appear in.
